title: Say My Name
description: Mia needs to hire an architect. While she’s waiting to talk to him, she hears his voice, and she immediately knows who he is. There’s no doubt Liam is Doctor Sean, a faceless voice actor that has released Mia’s favorite NSFW audios. Even if she loves his content, she doesn’t want him to know she knows about him. But Liam can see something’s off, and he’s so irresistible, Mia can’t help but like him.Their chemistry is insane, but after a while, their insecurities, their past, and a scary doubt about Liam, threaten their relationship.It's a love story between two people who are going to learn how to trust each other, and it contains a lot of hot sex, with kinky stuff and dirty talk.It’s a standalone.
author: Jane  Lee
